name: UNIT
description:
You have to use 3 units to clear over 30 waves of enemies, but at any given point, 2 of them are out of control. This game was made for the GMTK2020 game jam.

Controls:

WASD -> move.

Left click -> shoot

Right click on a unit, to select it. (You can also use the numbers 1-2-3  for faster selection)
